overview: A short music documentary of Absolutevalueofy (Ulysse dans la ville) playing Ukulele and singing "Just You" from "Twin Peaks Season 2". filmed on July 21, 2022 in Shenzhen, China.  In order to commemorate my last two months (July and August) in China before going abroad to study, I decided to shoot three documentaries (a.k.a "Endless Trilogy") based on my real-life experiences during July and August.  "JUST YOU" is the Part 1 of the "Endless Trilogy", which is not only a music video, but also a very personal short film about the trip in Shenzhen with two of my best friends, Junhee and Absolutevalueofy.
title: JUST YOU
